description:
Before there can be Personal Improvement there must first be Personal Awareness!

In the first of a three part series, we will explore your values, thought patterns and emotional patterns and how they have been shaped, influenced and/or impacted by your lifeâ€™s experiences.

Once you discover your true values, thought patterns and emotional patterns, you will discover the difference between rational decisions and emotional decisions as well as the strengths and weaknesses of each. This is important because we must understand that our lives are made up of a pile of decisions, and without the right knowledge and understanding, the decisions we make can have a negative impact on our lives as well as on the lives of those we care about.

Lastly, after going through the Personal Exploration process, we will make the difficult skill of Personal Awareness simple by going through a practical, easy to understand chart that explains the Levels of Awareness.

This workshop requires courage to discover more truth about yourself, which will give you the foundation to attain the success you have always dreamed of.
title: Personal Exploration
